ai-thag4.10:1.1_0: “Dhamma surely protects one who practices Dhamma;
ai-thag4.10:1.2_0: the teaching brings happiness when practiced well.
ai-thag4.10:1.3_0: this is the benefit of practicing Dhamma:
ai-thag4.10:1.4_0: He who lives by the Dhamma does not go to a bad destination.
ai-thag4.10:2.1_0: It’s not the case that Dhamma and what is not Dhamma
ai-thag4.10:2.3_0: What is not Dhamma leads to hell,
ai-thag4.10:2.4_0: while Dhamma takes you to a good place.
ai-thag4.10:3.1_0: So you should rouse enthusiasm for the teachings;
ai-thag4.10:3.2_0: Such is the Happy One, the Happy One,
ai-thag4.10:3.3_0: The disciples of the best of Holy Ones are firm in the teaching;
ai-thag4.10:3.4_0: those wise ones are led on, headed to the very best of refuges.”
ai-thag4.10:4.1_0: “The boil has been burst from its root,
ai-thag4.10:4.2_0: the net of craving is eradicated.
ai-thag4.10:4.3_0: He has ended transmigration, he has nothing,
ai-thag4.10:4.4_0: he’s like the full moon on a bright night.”
